95. $\cfrac{(x-1)(y-3)(y-2x)}{x-2}=0\Leftrightarrow \begin{cases}\left[\begin{array}{l}x=1,\\ y=3,\\ y=2x.\end{array}\right.\\ x\neq2.\end{cases}$
